C

chooseLanguage - Static variable in class GUIPackage.LanguageWindow
 
Cipher - Class in cipheringPackage
This is Cipher Class that extends the Key Class It is the parent of both Encryption and Decryption Classes It contains the shared attributes (fields) among Encryption and Decryption Classes with getter and setter methods to manipulate them
Cipher() - Constructor for class cipheringPackage.Cipher
the constructor take no parameters
cipheringPackage - package cipheringPackage
 
createCipherWindow(Language, GuiListener) - Static method in class GUIPackage.EncryptionWindow
This methods creates a pop-up window to show the resulted cipher text after the encryption
createDecryptionWindow(Language, GuiListener) - Static method in class GUIPackage.DecryptionWindow
This methods creates a Decryption Window
createEncryptionWindow(Language, GuiListener) - Static method in class GUIPackage.EncryptionWindow
This methods creates a Decryption Window
createLanguageWindow(GuiListener) - Static method in class GUIPackage.LanguageWindow
This method creates the LanguageWindow it's static to be accessed directly without having to create an instance of the class
createMainMenu(Language, GuiListener) - Static method in class GUIPackage.MainMenuWindow
This methods creates the MainMenu Window according to the language chosen by the user
createPlainTextWindow(Language, GuiListener) - Static method in class GUIPackage.DecryptionWindow
This methods creates a pop-up window to show the resulted plain text after the decryption
